resources.string:
Welcome to SafeStay, the app dedicated to keeping you secure, anytime and anywhere. Developed with your safety in mind, SafeStay harnesses the power of GPS technology to ensure that help is always just a click away. In any emergency, SafeStay facilitates immediate communication by sending your precise location to your designated contacts, ensuring timely assistance.

Our Team:
- Shahani A. Callueng - Lead Developer
- Valerie Joy P. Calabitin - UI/UX Designer
- Eliza Kyla D. Lafradez - Project Manager

At SafeStay, we believe in a world where technology empowers individuals to protect themselves and their loved ones effortlessly. Thank you for choosing SafeStayâ€”where your safety is our priority.
